website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot A480 may be a basic low-priced compact camera, but at least it takes good photos.

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small digital that would fit in my shirt pocket that used AA batteries and of course took good pictures. The Canon A480 far exceed my expectation. Out of the box it was so intuitive to use that I hardly looked at the manual. I took tons of pictures and they all came out great. There was a bad review here by someone who said there was a problem with "battery charging" all the time, however I noticed it once and that was it, and even then it was for just a couple of seconds. If you want an easy camera that does alot (the movies were great on this little guy) then this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Bww

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not record the time/date and makes me review every picture. I have had several of these Olympus cameras, and the one they sent me is broken. Do not buy one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera - Haven't had a chance to learn all it's features
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for 3 children's birthday parties. The pictures are very good, some could be even better if I was better at using it. Very detailed pictures with great quality when I really take my time and all conditions are good. I'm anxious to spend more time learning all the things it can do. Would be nice if it was a little more compact. Also, when you take a picture it only stays in view about 2 seconds before the screen goes blank. It would be nice to have a longer time to take a look at your shot without having to go into review.
customer_reviews.author: Nana O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Used Canon Powershot A480
customer_reviews.text: The camera was fine as far as all the functions working properly and the picture quality is great. The only problem we had was there was some corrosion on the battery contacts and it drains batteries dead even when off. It appears someone left some AA batteries in it to corrode and it caused some damage. But it does work fine as far as the funtions. It just has a very short battery life and you cant leave batteries in it when its turned off.
customer_reviews.author: david ubach

customer_reviews.title: Fatal Error strikes again
customer_reviews.text: I was OK with this camera and just getting used to it. It does take a long time to recharge the batteries, even with recommended batteries, but its now got a "Lens Error" every time I try to use it. SO far Canon refuses to take it back even though it's within the year warranty. I think it's defective. They think I broke it. I was only able to use it for 5 months and I've been very careful with it. I'm going back to my Kodaks.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 10 year old niece. She absolutely loves the camera. She especially likes shooting videos. The video works with ease the camera does have a speaker. Picture quality is as good as any I have seen. It is fun to get her perspective of life through photos. I have a older camera, and hers is probably better than mine, plus it was $200 bucks cheaper. I don't think you will find a better deal. I have no negative comments for this camera. It is really small, will easily fit in an adults pocket. If you would like your kid to capture moments in their life this is the one. It's just a complete bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Canon fan but my lens mechanism developed problems too soon
customer_reviews.text: Reason for the review is to document the failure of the lens mechanism. Have owned this for less than 12 months. Three months ago, noticed that the mechanism developed a grating sound. It still works but sometimes I have to manually assist the lens open and close. Ridiculous. I treated this camera, like I do my other electronics, well. It goes into a case when it's not being used. I was disappointed since I trust the Canon brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pronove

customer_reviews.title: Use with CHDK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a cheap camera that could be hacked (google CHDK--it's a software kit that gives you a lot more control over your Canon camera). This, combined with a Gorillapod tripod and a 16 GB SD card, let me take time-lapse images with manual control over focus, ISO, and shutter speed, for well under $100. The only things I'm not crazy about are the lack of an internal rechargeable battery and the mediocre quality of the images.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Two quick reasons why I would never buy this camera again, * The flash has to recharge for a few seconds after every shot. This gets REALLY annoying when your kid is doing something cute and you don't get the shot. * It eats batteries for lunch, and we often pick it up to find out the batteries are drained, missing the shot..again I'm using NiMH rechargeable batteries too, so that isn't the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Good budget camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a solid quality budget camera. For under $100, you get a camera that takes high-resolution (10megapixels) photos. Response time is however slow as it takes many seconds to recharge the flash and be ready for the next shot. There is no view finder other than the LCD screen. However, back to my previous point, this is a basic low-budget camera so you would need to manage your expectations. You get great pictures, easy of use, and not a lot of bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Alain from San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this camera
customer_reviews.text: My kids (7 and 9 yrs old) got this camera. They took pictures all over the places. The camera is easy to use. Almost fool proof. Photo quality is usually great, but indoor or lower light photo quality is definitely not good at all. Battery life is excellent. All-in-all, the A480 is an excellent camera for the price. But there are much better camera at slightly higher price. People should also check out the Kodak camera for "value".
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Non functioning camera
customer_reviews.text: Received this camera from Adorama Camera and it did not work. Adorama Camera refused to accept it back. Instead the camera had to be returned to Canon directly for repair of a new camera. Canon repaired it and sent it back within a week. Five stars for Canon and 0 stars for Adorama. Hence buyer beware! Nevertheless, this camera works well for a basically advanced point and shoot camera. Lightweight and great on battery life delivering very nice photos. Quality is enhanced if settings are adjusted to the type of subject and light available. It comes with a disc when downloaded contains an in-depth manual on every feature of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: luvnglife

customer_reviews.title: great little camera for price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy this camera was for me to use, I took several little videos and posted them right away for my kids, I took them of myself, and of my cat, they came out beautifully, The pictures I took were of myself also for account pics at facebook, I just love the camera, haven't had to change batteries yet either, have been using it for a couple of weeks now, also took some video of a ftreworks dispaly one night, beautiful color, and good sound! I am making a video diary of my move back to my home town, I am very pleasantly surprised as I am electronically challenged.
customer_reviews.author: NubbieK

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera recently and I am very satisfied with it. I works wonderful for taking pictures and shooting videos. The price was reasonable too. only one thing about this item, I did not receive an instruction manual for this item. I pretty much figured out how to operate the camera on my own, not too difficult. I am overall satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dellapenna

customer_reviews.title: Charging flash?
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this camera. The pictures come out great but gosh, it keep saying charging flash and I cant snap a picture most of the time. That really sucks. Also there is a delay when you take a picture too. I thought cameras are supossed to snap quick pictures. I mean whose gonna hold that special moment that long.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is obvious that the more you spend on a Canon the better the camera will be over all. But the quality of pictures and video it will always be great from any Canon camera. You just have some limitations in features on it, like my wife Canon is much more expensive but the more fetures and ease of use it becomes but the price I love this camera. It is awesome! Oh and the price is unreal!
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A380 10mp
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera plus that fact I got it in my favorite color BLUE....I only find one thing I do NOT like. My last canon had a zoom in lens to 23X, this camera is only 13X. While that is good, I would rather focus a little closer. I recommend this for daily use. I am never without my camera. This is light and easily portable. Anyone who gets this will be happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: much needed new camera
customer_reviews.text: We researched buying a camera and this one was the one at the price offered that gave me all the features I wanted - size of screen, sight and shoot, a little video time, number of pictures stored, functions. I am going to purchase the 2GB memory card and a bigger battery as soon as I become more familiar with the use of this one and use up the capacity.
customer_reviews.author: silver fox

customer_reviews.title: The PowerShot A480 10MP Digital Camera is a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: The PowerShot camera is one of the simplest and easy-to-use cameras I've ever owned. The menus are easy to figure out and setup is quick and easy. The big viewing screen makes it easy to see what you are about to shoot and review what you have already shot. The picture quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Zowar

customer_reviews.title: good point/shoot
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old daughter --- She never opened the manual and had this thing figured out . Snap shots and movies are good quality . Sound (movie mode) sound a bit tinny and distant -- this is to be expected. Menus are clear and orderly after 2 passes through them. Battery life ...... Buy a set of rechargeables ( I would say that about any of these types of cameras- they are all battery suckers due to the big video display) Zoom is acceptable until the digital kicks in then it starts to look like a cell phone photo. So far , it has been a sturdy little camera at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: daspoint

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty good camera for the price... i initially had another canon that cost about the same but had horrible photo quality for indoor shots. this one is much better in low indoor/low-light settings and is very crisp in outdoor settings. the macro setting also isn't horrible, and considering the price, is very good.
customer_reviews.author: athc23

customer_reviews.title: My camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my newest gadget, wish the manual instructions was on hard copy instead of the CD as I now have to print the whole thing to really sit down and get a good read. Camera works well, have taken over 200 pictures already and the different features are wonderful for the different occasions. Thanks a Million
customer_reviews.author: Janjan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon cameras and for the price this one perfect. This is an extra digital camera for our family, for the beach and one to always have with us when we travel around. It so easy to use, has features that are useful for the more experienced picture taker but an auto for those who prefer to just point and shoot. The pictures are wonderful and I'd recommend this for any experienced or first time digital camera user.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dondero

customer_reviews.title: canon digital camera review
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The only drawback which I am realizing now is that I should have taken more care to protect the screen because it has a couple of scratches on it, but the picture quality is excellent. it is easy to use, the batteries last a really long time and I will definitely buy another one when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go camera
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 2 of these cameras. They work great. I've had them for about 4 to 5 years and they still take really good photos. They are compact which is nice and they hold a memory card which is better. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this! IT was a gift for her and she uses it all the time, small, compact, easy to use as my mother is elderly and not up to date on technology. Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: reasonable camera
customer_reviews.text: pros: Relatively good camera with good features. These are the video and mic quality av input so you can view pictures on your tv Cons: it has to charge the flash, slow shutter speed, has difficulty in getting good shots in the nights appears somewhat grainy at times, one of my shots had a red eye beats me how that got there. doesnt have image stablization so you may have to hold still to take a picture. When zooming a picture the quality become blurry and grainy. Overall consider the low cost for a Canon, if you are not a techy person, this camera can be used for a everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Camera was to be new. It was not!
customer_reviews.text: Camera was not new as posted. Box was damaged. Box had been opened. Batteries had been in the camera and used. Instruction were there but in a quart sandwich bag. Who know where the camera has been.
customer_reviews.author: lookout

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price! For $100 you get everything you need to start taking photos- a memory card, batteries and a USB cord for downloading. The camera is very easy to figure out and it takes excellent pictures. For the money, it's a steal! I purchased more memory and a battery charger for mine. New comment 2-12-10: I recently bought an Olympus SLR camera because I found myself wanting perfection in my photos. I am going to give this camera to my mother. I still think for the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelan

customer_reviews.title: I love my little camera
customer_reviews.text: I just got my camera and so far I love it. The only thing I would have to say is that the recycle time is a little slow, so it wouldn't be good if you had to take a lot of rapid shots. But I dont so its perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS IT JUST ME?
customer_reviews.text: Is it just me, or are these digital cameras too hard to figure out? I have the get out the instructions every time I use this. The controls aren't intuitive or even mildly friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Get the SD1100IS instead
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and got to use it a couple times. I would highly recommend skiping this and getting the SD1100IS instead. Not much difference in price for a smaller, better performing, more durable camera that is just as easy to use. Trust me you will NOT notice the difference from 10MP to 8MP! If this is your price range - get the slightly older model that is a much more refined product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Smith

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera when I bought it in 2010 (and used it nearly daily). After much use, the motor began making noises, and I got the occasional lens error, so I decided it was time to replace it. Love, love, love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Byrne

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera far better than previous ones. except when using flash, picture is delayed a few seconds but its okay. its easy to use and it snaps great looking pictures. I cant get over how easy it is to use...
customer_reviews.author: G. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good camera for $92
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera from a recommendation on the DIY book scanner ([...]) forums. Overall, I am pleased with the camera given its price. The battery life if pretty terrible, I get about 70 pictures worth with it, which was about 2 days during my summer vacation. The batteries got expensive fast! The cord to plug it into an outlet (sold separately) is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Arr Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera with a small price tag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect photos,acceptable videos and LCD,easy usage ,acceptable size and weight. It might be as well to be icons on function buttons more understandable.For example:OK text on the button is more understandable than "Func set" text, on the zoom In/Out buttons it would be better to set icons like magnifier with +/- symbols than strange big tree/small trees. Conclusion: As a matter of fact I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: zazaturman

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital camera. I bought it based on the reviews on Amazon.com. I'm used to using manual SLRs so this was a change. The camera is really good for the price. Easy to use. Not super big. Decent quality pictures even in low light. I like the macro function. The pictures look a lot better on my computer than the LCD camera screen. I've only had it a month or 2 and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a practical camera.Size is ok, easy to understand instructions.It gives you great options if you are taking pictures of an aquarium, night scene, children, landscape which is quite helpful. But I was disappointed with the time it takes to charge the flash specially during night scene, you miss out on candid moments while you wait on the flash. This is my only inconvenience. Your 2AA Batteries can last up to 650pics. Rechargeable batteries are recommended. It is a bargain price for the quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Luschy

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, just a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice camera but looked smaller (thinner) online. I returned it for a Canon Powershot SD1200IS instead, paid a little more (luckily found a nearly new one for $125), but well worth it. If form factor isn't a big deal to you, this is a nice camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera it takes really good pics. So worth the money, I would recommend this camera to someone looking for a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Bart&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best low price camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best low price camera on the market, not great in low light but a great point and shoot camera for when you don't want to lug around a SLR camera on a vacation!
customer_reviews.author: John P. Gunther

customer_reviews.title: great value in a point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera when you want the ease of point and shoot. It has most of the features of cameras costing much more and the Amazon price is the best I found.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A480
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter so I haven't personally used it, but when I spoke to her about it, she simply said she loved it and that it did everything she needed it to do. She also liked the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this camera and it has been great. Good pics and movies, easy to figure out, very nice. Not too thin, but for the price, it is not a problem. For the money, it is perfect for what I need! I use it during my work almost every day. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Sierra

customer_reviews.title: The camera is great as long as your super careful. One small bump while the lens is open broke it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very user friendly camera with pro-like functionality. I was very sad to have it break after a month of use. My son ever-so-lightly bumped me while I was taking a photo and the lens jammed. Into the trash my money went. Be careful with this baby!
customer_reviews.author: The Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera, but...
customer_reviews.text: The PowerShot A480 produces attractive photos that are sharp and colorful. However, 128 pages of instructions do not exactly make it the "point and shoot" camera that my wife wanted. There are features that she will never use, but she will like the camera when she figures out the basic functions she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Hungry for batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great camera except mine eats batteries. 30-35 photos and it says to replace batteries. The alkaline batteries, (normally 1.5 volts) test at 1.47 volts when it says to replace them. The "dead" batteries worked in a flashlight for 4 hours before I shut the flashlight off. It reccomends NiMH batteries for longer shooting time. NiMH batteries are 1.4 volts. They probably won't even work in this camera. I took the camera to the CANON service center. I'm hoping they tell me there is something wrong and repairable. Otherwise I could spend more in batteries in a year than I spent on the camera.
customer_reviews.author: electricmanbob

customer_reviews.title: No IS, otherwise just fine
customer_reviews.text: This is an entry-level and amateur camera that produces excellent photographs, and has multiple scene-settings. It doesn't have some convenient features of more expensive cameras, including rechargeable batteries and, particularly, IS. But I use it casually, and I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this...let me tell you why...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this thing a couple months and used it sparingly. After about a week it started having trouble with memory cards, giving me the message, "Card Locked!" and you can't do anything with the camera. The cards were not locked. I have tried 3 different cards, it will not read any of them anymore. What a piece of junk. I searched online, a lot of people are having this problem and guess what...no solution! Junk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. Good for taking on trips. Takes good pictures and seems easy enough to use. Only takes two batteries at a time, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine young shooter...
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera--I'm no photog, but this unit does everything I need it to--plenty satisfied--thanks!
customer_reviews.author: santonesmusic

customer_reviews.title: John Parsons review of Canon PowerShot A480 camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than I would like, but is ideal for the gift I chose it to provide. Fits neatly in a pocket, yet provides remarkable features for either point and shoot or adjustment for custom photos. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Parons

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This Canon Powershot series is really easy to use. I like the portability factor and the fact I got a great deal on a great camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannon camera review
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the camera. There is just one thing that has a concern with me and that is that I have adjusted all the sounds that I can on the camera but I have never heard the 2 beeps when you push the shutter 1/2 way done to let you know that the picture is in focus.
customer_reviews.author: KayM

customer_reviews.title: Canon rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been pleased with Canon products and this camera is no exception. Even though it is a low end camera (price-wise) the pictures are great. Isn't that what a camera is about?
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely attached to this camera since I got it. The price is right, the camera is great. The reason I'm attached is because I can use it in nearly every light and get crystal clear pictures. It's nothing professional, but it's great, and some of the pictures I shot with it came out looking nearly as good as studio pictures.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful easy to use. Size, weight perfect for take along. Takes nice pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had the int>pic cable. I will need to get it
customer_reviews.author: Norma U.

customer_reviews.title: quality product for little money
customer_reviews.text: very inexpensive canon that does what it says it will do. build quality seems to be good enough to last a few years if well taken care of. i bought five for a construction company and have had no problems as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Travisty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing perform
customer_reviews.text: My new Canon Power Shot A480 is a beauty, I love it. It is not a complicated camera, its performance is amazing and the pictures have beautiful color. I am very pleased with my new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice Camera for the money, easy to use, takes great pics. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: A Canon for under $100. Uses AA batteries which is great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Cruzn Suzn

customer_reviews.title: lens didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I don't own this camera. I bought it for a friend as a gift. She was able to take some pretty good photos with it, but after only 10 days, the lens faltered and failed to retract and now we have to get it fixed. Hopefully, this is uncommon, but it's something you as a future buyer might want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice 'in between DSLR and iphone' camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice 'in between DSLR and iphone' camera, for getting general poses, settings, and textures :) (That's...what I use it for). Not bad battery life, but I think I'd go Lithium Ion next time
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: camera review
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice at taking pictures so this camera is perfect for me. Not too many features just point and shot and so far the pictures have been perfect!!!! Its easy to load the pictures on your computer and the price was the best I found anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been a great starter camera for my 13 year old daughter---Makes outstanding photos, very easy to use, easy to handle. Go Canon!
customer_reviews.author: Jabock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small camera!
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera to take several great photos at our local quilt show. Very good flash coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D. Greve

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A480
customer_reviews.text: I purchased camera before vacation. It was easy to use, my family really liked the camera. The price paid was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Boogie Down

customer_reviews.title: A decent Introductory camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my girlfriend. She is not tech savy but we went through it together and this camera allows her to take nice pictures in most conditions without too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: There are a few scratches on the screen that I didn't know about but all in all it's a good purchase. I had the same camera before but I broke it and was looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. N

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality, solid value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as gifts for two young nieces. Surprisingly good picture quality for such a reasonably priced point and shoot. Only downside would be that the body of the camera is quite thick and it would be difficult to pocket.
customer_reviews.author: RSN

customer_reviews.title: It takes horrible pictures sometimes
customer_reviews.text: The camera ended up stop working for me again after I had sent it to be service. It takes horrible pictures sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthian Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Well reviewed, great little camera at the best price around on Amazon. I wanted a camera that would produce great pictures, be small and easy to use, and also be relatively durable for a child. This is the one that all my research pointed me to. So far we have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: swissmiss

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to Vegas and it was great! Great pictures, and it's small enough to fit in a tiny purse.
customer_reviews.author: Trixy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife who can barely turn it on. Few buttons with the few features she uses is perfect for non-technical types who only look for decent "snapshots."
customer_reviews.author: Jaxken

customer_reviews.title: all's good
customer_reviews.text: for my first digital camera i was impressed.my batteries lasted very long(disposibles).need to to see if i can get ni-cad's(not ni-mh!) for it(thinking green!!).shipping was very quick.price was good.i just need to spend more time with it,to understand it better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my camera today and I was impressed. It's so tiny and has so much in the way of capabilities. All I wanted it for was to take pictures of restaurants when I eat out (for Yelp). Without adjusting the white balance or anything, every picture has been pefect. I have three other Canon cameras: a G2 which cost me about $800 when new, a D60, and a 20D. All of them are too large to lug around with me, while the A480 goes in my shirt pocket. I uploaded some pictures, take a look.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Nice, clear pictures. Easy to use. Nice size, makes it convenient to carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a lower price, nice little camera, this is a good one to get. I have long been a Canon fan and when we had to have a camera for work, this was the best one for the price. And the Navy blue color is a nice change from the standard silver colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sales Guy

customer_reviews.title: did better than my S90
customer_reviews.text: Did a quick walkaround Old Town Alexandria and it did great. Results were better than a small Nikon Coolpix and equal to and in once instance better than the fancy S90 of mine. This was all outdoor work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vergason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canon product
customer_reviews.text: Canon provides an excellent, inexpensive, point & shoot compact camera free of problems. Provides very good quality picture for prints or internet use- my wife loves her gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not having to charge batteries and getting that picture quality and for around $[...] bucks, a great product
customer_reviews.author: D. Otani

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic camera, purchased for our construction field staff, with varying levels of technical ability. Seems to be an all around good camera, with basic easy to use fucntions. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Very easy to use. I dropped the first one I owned so I went back for the exact same model. This is a great camera for someone who is camera illiterate.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new camera. So easy to use and great snapshots even when little ones are on the move I get a sharp picture.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spannage

customer_reviews.title: good pics
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 14yr old, so far so good,good pics for the type camera,but wish it had the ion battery instead of AA's
customer_reviews.author: Peter Shim

customer_reviews.title: excellent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: When my sony started to eat batteries, I started to look for a replacement. Good price, good size, and works great. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera for the $
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. Reports are that it is an excellent buy for the $'s I paid at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RayD

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for us to take on vacation to Busch Gardens and loved it. Even though my two little ones could not stay still I got clear, great pictures of them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: A good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This a excelent camera compare with your price, good picture quality, easy portability and good batery life, only I would like that was more rapid.
customer_reviews.author: R. TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowershotA480
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable 10 mp digitalcamera! Easy to setup and use great software. Very sastified with this camera
customer_reviews.author: James W. Ely

customer_reviews.title: Canon powershot A480
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use; takes great pictures even in low light; so simple to upload pictures.
customer_reviews.author: DoJeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wonderful pictures, and easy to use. Nice size and handles great!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: Just drop batteries into slot, add the memory card, set on automatic and click away. It's that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip V. La Scola

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: I am not thrilled with this camera but it works fine. My major complant with it is that it has to recharge the flash after every 5 pictures or so. Very annoying when you have to stop for your camera to charge!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Grainy pictures
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are very grainy, quite surprisingly. The A70 that I have is much better in comparison. The flash recharge indeed is very annoying and I do not expect it to do that with fresh batteries. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: njdude

customer_reviews.title: great pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to take pictures on vacation. It works great for that purpose. The pictures are very clear and detailed indoors and out. My only complaint with this camera is that if you take a vertical picture, it doesn't know that's what you did, so you have to turn the camera sideways to view it properly and do the rotation in your photo management software too.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Another Lens Error
customer_reviews.text: Lens Error one day after I received camera. Pictures and video were good for a point and shoot until the lens seized while extended. Returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: pokey

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera looking for an easy point and shoot that would still take good quality pics -- to offset our larger digital SLR (just too much of a pain to drag along some times). After 4 days of use we are unimpressed. The picture quality is extremely grainy. The "charging flash" is extremely annoying. And the battery life is poor -- at least compared to other cameras I've had. I'm sending this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot A480 10 MP Digital Camera with 3.3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD (Silver)
feature_bullets: 10.0-megapixel resolution captures enough detail for prints up to 13 x 19 inches
3.3x optical zoom and Optical Image Stabilizer; 2.5-inch LCD screen
DIGIC III Image Processor; 15 shooting modes
Compatible with SD/SDHC, MMC/MMC Plus/HC MMC Plus (not included)
